titleStmt.title: By the Lords-Justices of Ireland. Charles Porter, Tho: Coningesby. Whereas several soldiers of the French regiment of foot under the command Colonel Francis du Cambon, have deserted, ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Coningsby, Thomas Coningsby, Earl, 1656?-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook assignee of Benjamin Tooke, printer to the King and Queen's most Excellent Majesties on Ormond-Key,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
"Given at the Castle of Dublin this fifth day of March, 1691.".
Date given according to Lady Day dating.
Steele notation: Arms 201. French clare, of.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
